project_name.justification: The text states: 'Headwater Gold Inc. (CSE:HWG) (OTC:HWAUF) (the "Company" or "Headwater") is pleased to announce acquisition of the Lodestar epithermal gold-silver project (the “Property”)...'

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first paragraph: 'Headwater Gold Inc. (CSE:HWG) (OTC:HWAUF) (the "Company" or "Headwater") is pleased to announce acquisition of the Lodestar epithermal gold-silver project...'

ceo_buyer.justification: The text identifies the CEO of the acquiring company: 'Caleb Stroup, the President and CEO of the Company, states: “We are very excited to have acquired another high-quality asset in the Aurora District..."'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The company has an option to acquire a full interest: 'Headwater retains a 30-year option to purchase an undivided 100% interest in the Vendor Claims...'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is described as a 'gold-silver project': '...acquisition of the Lodestar epithermal gold-silver project (the “Property”)...'

verified_article_link.justification: The article link is not provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The acquisition terms specify payments in US dollars: 'By making an initial cash payment of US$20,000...'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash payment is the sum of the initial payment (US$20,000) and the final purchase payment (US$1,500,000). From the text: 'By making an initial cash payment of US$20,000... Headwater retains a 30-year option to purchase an undivided 100% interest in the Vendor Claims for a one time payment of US$1,500,000...'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is structured with cash payments; no share payments are mentioned as part of the acquisition terms.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction terms specify cash payments, not a combined cash and share value.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares are being issued as part of this acquisition.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants are mentioned in the acquisition terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: While the deal is an option agreement, there are no payments specified in the form of stock options.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares are being issued as part of the acquisition, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The 2023 work plan mentions a CSAMT survey and soil sampling, but does not specify a drilling commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The 2023 work plan outlines activities but does not state a specific monetary value for an exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The acquisition is subject to a 3% NSR royalty retained by the seller: '...purchase an undivided 100% interest in the Vendor Claims for a one time payment of US$1,500,000 subject to a 3% NSR royalty...'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text mentions the project consists of 133 mining claims (121 staked + 12 acquired), but does not provide a total area in units like hectares or square kilometers.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No coverage area value is provided, so no unit can be extracted.

resource_size.justification: The text describes exploration targets and historic drilling with anomalous gold, but does not contain a quantified mineral resource estimate.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as 'Headwater Gold Inc. (CSE: HWG, OTCQB: HWAUF)' in the text.
